00064     class _OgreExport ResourceManager : public ScriptLoader
00065     {
00066     public:
00067         OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX // public to allow external locking

00091             bool isManual = false, ManualResourceLoader* loader = 0,

00101

00105

00217         
00235         virtual void remove(ResourceHandle handle);

00254         virtual ResourcePtr getByName(const String& name);
00257         virtual ResourcePtr getByHandle(ResourceHandle handle);
00258         
00260         virtual bool resourceExists(const String& name)
00261         {
00262             return !getByName(name).isNull();
00263         }
00265         virtual bool resourceExists(ResourceHandle handle)
00266         {
00267             return !getByHandle(handle).isNull();
00268         }
00269 
00273         virtual void _notifyResourceTouched(Resource* res);

00318 
00332         virtual void parseScript(DataStreamPtr& stream, const String& groupName) {}
00333 
00340         virtual Real getLoadingOrder(void) const { return mLoadOrder; }

00380         virtual void checkUsage(void);

00387         typedef std::map<ResourceHandle, ResourcePtr> ResourceHandleMap;
00388     protected:

00403 
00404     public:
00405         typedef MapIterator<ResourceHandleMap> ResourceMapIterator;
00410         ResourceMapIterator getResourceIterator(void) 
00411         {
00412             return ResourceMapIterator(mResourcesByHandle.begin(), mResourcesByHandle.end());
